text: Tokkel usuk Qibaada elle Aba Aracal isi Rabbih foocal Salaatah Soolak kaa kallacak Suge waqdi, Malayka kaah Secteh, Diggah Yalli Yacya deqsita Baxal koo Aytikumusa usuk Yallih Qangarat Yaabaku waa Nabii Qiisa Yallih Farmoyta kinnim Nummaysak, usuk (Nabii Yacya kinnuk) isi marak Abbah Anuk, usuk Yallak meesih Agabuu kee dambittek isi Nafsi Ayxeerak, meqe Ambiyak Nabiik teyna yakkeemil koo Aytikumusa Yalli kaak itte malayka
